Pleasanton.Alameda County Fire Department:
The Alameda County Fire Department (ACFD) is the fire department for the county of Alameda and is responsible for servicing an area 508 square miles (1,320 km2) in size.


== History ==
The ACFD was founded on July 1, 1993, as a special district with the County’s Board of Supervisors serving as the Fire District’s Board of Directors. This consolidation combined separate departments that had previously serviced the Castro Valley, Eden Landing and the County Fire Patrol.
